text: Shooting a single, large projectile instead of many smaller ones is more effective when fighting enemies at the distance.
Shooting a single, large projectile instead of many smaller ones is more effective when fighting enemies at the distance.
Shooting many smaller projectiles instead of one large one is more effective when fighting multiple small targets, such as infantry units.
Use a projectile formed of two sub-calibre balls to oppress the target. Useful against a large target like monsters.
